title: Vertical pink line on Google Pixel 4 screen after 50 cm drop
content:
I just accidentally dropped my Pixel 4 from about 50 cm distance to the ground. The phone worked just fine after the drop but suddenly a thin pink vertical line came out from no where. Does the vertical line appeared because of my Pixel 4 is a defected unit or because of the drop? 

Is there any warranty that i could claim?
